title: SSRF in Internal API
short: Found SSRF in internal API endpoint allowing server access.
description: The SSRF allowed retrieving internal metadata and sensitive API endpoints. Sanitized PoC included safe curl examples.

title: IDOR in File Download
short: Unauthorized file access via parameter manipulation.
description: Exposed internal documents using predictable file IDs. Report included remediation steps for access control.

title: SSTI in Template Rendering
short: Template injection in user dashboard allowed code execution.
description: Demonstrated safe payloads in development environment. Suggested escaping user input to prevent code execution.

title: Mobile API Token Exposure
short: API tokens were exposed via unencrypted local storage.
description: Provided steps for secure storage and token rotation. Verified on Android/iOS.

title: XSS in Comment Section
short: Reflected XSS in public comment input field.
description: Safe demo payload used to illustrate the vulnerability. Recommended proper input sanitization and CSP headers.
